runs.comm: starts off with a big wide down the leg side. Did the ball slip? It was very wide
follows it up with a perfect outswinger, luring the batsman into a near-fatal prod. Dhoni collects.
Poretfield makes sure he gets that front foot well out and across, close to the line of the outswinger and drives to cover
charges down the track, drives to left of mid-off where Yuvraj lunges to make the stop and fire in a throw
full and swinging away sharply, left alone
moves around the crease, Irfan keeps it simple and hurls across yet another outswinger and beats the bat
full and straight this time, lunges across to push it out to mid-on
lands on a length around off and shapes away late, Porterfield pushes inside the line
big swing and a miss. Well outside off stump, Porterfield chases it but doesn't connect
on a length, outside off, forced away to Ishant Sharma at third man
full pitched on the off stump, in the slot, driven hard but straight to cover. He missed out a four there.
backs outside leg stump and so, Zaheer fires it outside off and the batsman can't reach it
cuts back in late, the batsman is cramped up, has a swat at it and the ball threads the bat and pad gap
Clatter! The stumps are all over the place. It was really full, near yorker length, and Bray played all around it.
full and on the middle and leg, lunges out to scoop it over mid-on
backs away to punch on the up but it falls just short of mid-off
pushes it across Wilson who allows it to pass through to Dhoni
full length delivery, tilting in from outside off, driven on the front foot to cover
130.4 kmph length delivery angling away, Wilson tries to cut but the ball rushes past the edge
doesn't quite lean forward to get close to the line of the delivery and hence takes out the bottom-hand off the handle as he goes for the square drives and gets it past backward point
The captain falls. Porterfield goes for the big slash over point at a back of length delivery outside off but manages only to edge it straight to first slip
Botha saves the hat-trick as he gets forward and across to drive to cover
gets the inside edge on the attempted drive and will pick up two runs to fine-leg. Botha is also a left-handed batsman
Top shot. It wasn't all that short in length but Botha, already standing well inside the crease, rocked back to cut it hard past backward point
very full delivery on the middle, Botha drives it crisply straight past the bowler

And he picks up his third wicket. BOtha, who looked good in his brief stay, is gone now. He chased a length delivery outside off, not moving his feet, and flashed it to left of first slip where Yusuf takes a sharp catch.
nice. Very nice. It was full, very full, outside off and he placed his front foot out and square drove it through cover point
drags back the length but it's cut away to deep backward point. The backward point fielder took some pace off it with a dive
full in length, close to the off stump, defended on the front foot
length delivery around the off stump, driven to cover
moves outside leg stump, Ishant hits the good length on the off stump, run down to third man
fires across a bouncer and Dhoni moves to his left to collect it
Powerplays over. (18-over game) Yuvraj floats it full outside off, driven through the off side
flighted on the middle stump line, turned towards midwicket
fetches it from outside off and paddles to backward square leg
really well up on the off and middle, driven to long-on
slightly quicker, skidding in, defended to the off side
slower, fuller, just outside off, driven to extra cover

Ojha has picked a wicket off his first ball. Again. It skidded on around the off stump from short of length, the batsman went for the pull but got a fatal inside-edge. Gone! Nothing great about the ball but poor shot execution.
slow through the air, full outside off, tapped to backward point region
dips in on the leg stump line, rolls off the pad
comes down the track, Ojha flights it across but gets it to dip quickly, pushed out to cover

run out missed by Raina-Ojha combo. It was dug out to extra cover, Raina moved to his right and fired in a slightly wide through and Ojha couldn't collect. The non-striker was also at the striker's end. Raina had to just lob it over but obviously he didn't see how far the non-striker had gone
goes right back to push it back to the bowler
goes back again to swat it past square leg
from round the stumps now, flighted full, pushed back to Bhaji
short in length, turns away from the off stump, cut away through covers
from over the wicket for the righthander, lands it full on the middle, revere swept to backward point
quicker, arm-ball outside off, tapped to short third man
A boundary after 23 balls. Via a reverse sweep. It was flighted full on the middle and off and he got it past backward point
leans across to dab it to the on side for a single
loopy flighted delivery on the middle stump line, punched towards the non-striker, almost a collision there and Ojha couldn't get across to stop it
slightly short in length, cut away through the off side
tossed full on the middle, swept away to deep backward square leg
stays back to push it through wide midwicket and they run hard to come back for the second run
from round the stumps, full on the leg and middle, driven to wide deep midwicket
top spinner that bounces past the prod and hits the pad high
the armer, skidding on quickly towards middle and off with bounce, cramped for room but he manages to stab it to backward point

Done in by the doosra. Too good for Wilson who played completely down the wrong alley. He didn't pick it and drove through the line. The ball went on to clean up the off stump. Harbhajan gives him his signature send off... that little bye bye sign.
goes for the sweep and is hit on the pad outside off
goes back to defend back to the bowler
on the back foot, tucks it past square leg
lunges across, stabs the length delivery off the outside edge to third man. Yusuf rushes across and dives to his left but is unable to prevent the boundary
137.9 kmph delivery cutting in and it rushes through the bat and pad gap and goes to Dhoni
135.8 kmph kicks up from length and holds its line this time and beats the bat.
After taking one out, bringing one back in, he serves a bouncer this time, climbs over the attempted pull and Dhoni gathers
short in length, pulled away to long leg for a single
goes for the reverse sweep but doesn't connect and Dhoni whips the bails off
Undaunted by the previous failure, he goes for another reverse sweep and connects superbly this time. This ball was fuller than the previous one.
goes right back to nudge it to cover point
top spinner from round the stumps, moves in, past the prod and rolls away off the pad
slower, shorter in length, chipped towards long-on
looped across, on the middle and off, swept away for a single

arm-ball on the off stump line, beats the forward defensive stroke and catches him in front. Loud shout by Ojha, not supported by Dhoni and the umpire turns it down. That was close. In fact would have hit the middle
turned to backward square leg for a single
lovely loopy delivery, skidding on and in fact flicked the bails enroute to going to Dhoni! Whoa! They stood very firm on the stumps
lunges forward to push through the on side for a single
worked past square leg for a run
moves outside the off stump and paddles the length delivery .. .. will just get a single as fine-leg is back near the ropes
fullish, outside off, square driven through cover point
slanted across past the batsman who tries to dab it to third man but misses.
low full toss outside off, driven to sweeper cover
tries a slower one, a full toss, lunges out to push it away to cover
short of length delivery bouncing over the off stump, tries to slash it away but no wood on leather
lovely slow delivery, it took an eternity to reach the other end, the batsman had completed the sweep shot by then; the ball rolled towards short third man
again slows up the pace, charges out, is made to wait and he drives to long-on
comes down the track, Ojha shortens the length and he lunges out to jab it to the off side
Fatal reverse sweep. No power behind that shot. Again, Ojha had not offered any pace behind the ball and the weak reverse sweep saw the ball lob straight to short third man

Poor stuff from West. It was well flighted delivery, above the eye-line,  and  punched towards mid-on. Raina rushes in from the deep and fires in a throw at the striker's end. The ball ricochets of Dhoni's pad and falls on the stumps. Poor stuff from the batsman, though. He was just ambling in; he didn't ground the bat but just lazily stepped in but that foot was in the air when the bails came off.
flighted full, jabbed off bat and pad to the off side
pulled away for a six. It was the short one and he backed away to go for the pull, got a thick top edge but the ball kept sailing into the night
from round the stumps, fullish, around off stump, pushed to extra cover
length delivery, skidding in from outside off, under-edges the cut and the ball rolls towards Dhoni but despite his direct hit at the striker's end they get home
moves outside off to paddle, Irfan serves a full toss on the off stump, lapped around the corner for a single
almost a yorker , squeezed out to cover point

back of length, homing in on the off stump, Cusack should have been cramped up in theory but he arched back at the last minute, made room somehow and unfurled a very skillful cut past backward point. Ishant ran around from wide third man, dived but only pushed it outside the boundary.
shuffles outside off stump, Zak hurls a full toss and White chipped it superbly to deep backward square-leg boundary.
hits short of length and gets it kick up outside off stump, White tried to cut it away but nicked it behind
slower one outside off, around 116 kmph full delivery, lunges out and is beaten
yorker tried, ends up as a full toss, pushed to mid-on region
Yet another full toss, outside off, slashed away to third man boundary.
he attempts another yorker, gets it right this time, dug out back to  him
slows up the pace, shortens the length, goes for the reverse sweep but pushes it weakly to short third man
turns in from outside off stump, pulled to midwicket, there was a chance of run out but Zaheer makes a mess; doesn't field it all and the ball rushes to the deep and they will get three!
flighted delivery on the middle stump, lunges out to chip it high towards wide long-on boundary
Another profitable reverse sweep. Tossed around the off stump and reversed away past short third man
charges down the track, Harbhajan drags back the length and beats the batsman. So he thought. The ball bounds away off the pad and runs down to third man boundary
moves outside leg stump, serves a doosra, swatted away to long-on
